resources.string: Chocolate was once used as currency.
Elsa from Frozen and Belle from Beauty and the Beast are actually related.
Ketchup was used as a medicine in the early 19th century.
There are more Subways worldwide than McDonalds and Wendys combined.
The Great Wall Of China is visible from the moon.
Virtually all Las Vegas gambling casinos ensure that they have no clocks.
Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa.
The inventor of C++ passed away from pneumonia.
